item.title: Posture Guided Human Action Recognition for Fitness Applications
item.description: Brief Abstract: Multi-stage deep learning based method for action recognition to predict upright as well as non-upright actions with high accuracy

item.title: 3D Hand Tracking in the wild
item.description: The project involves predicting accurate 3D hand positions in world space using multiple cameras including monochrome fisheye cameras and depth ToF sensor.

item.title: JumpShot - Multi Human Pose Estimation
item.description: This work uses multi-human pose estimation at the core along with posture detection.

item.title: Cross Lingual Video and Text Retrieval: A New Benchmark Dataset and Algorithm
item.description: Brief Abstract: Video retrieval using natural language queries requires learning semantically meaningful joint embeddings between the text and the audio-visual input.

item.title: Cross-Modal learning for Audio-Visual Video Parsing
item.description: Brief Abstract: In this paper, we present a novel approach to the audio-visual video parsing (AVVP) task that demarcates events from a video separately for audio and visual modalities.

item.title: Self supervised audio-visual learning
item.description: The thesis has revolved around multi-modal learning and how self-supervised objectives learn better embeddings.

item.title: Investigating self-supervised architectures for learning speech representations
item.description: In this project I along with my research group have explored various audio encoders.

item.title: Self-supervised cross modality representation learning
item.description: The seminar has focused around multi-modal learning and how self-supervised objectives learn better embeddings.

item.title: Caption Alignment for Low Resource Audio-Visual Data
item.description: Brief Abstract: Understanding videos via captioning has gained a lot of traction recently.

item.title: Sahayatra Android App
item.description: I have worked on developing a robust and open-source ride dispatch application.

item.title: Chat bot and Voice banking service
item.description: I-exceed is a digital transformation partner for leading financial institutions worldwide.

item.title: FOSSEE Summer Internship
item.description: Xcos is a Scilab tool dedicated to the modeling and simulation of hybrid dynamic systems including both continuous and discrete models.
